@graph.rdfs:label: Product
@graph.rdfs:comment: This is the schema for describing the Product schema used for outbreak.info.
The name of the material or reagent
@graph.rdfs:label: name

@graph.rdfs:comment: The name of the manufacturer of the material, biosample, or reagent
@graph.rdfs:label: manufacturer

@graph.rdfs:comment: The name of the brand of the reagent, material, or biological sample (if different from the manufacturer)
@graph.rdfs:label: brand

@graph.rdfs:comment: The catalog number or identifier of the material or reagent
@graph.rdfs:label: identifier

@graph.rdfs:comment: The type of material. Reagent, PPE, biological samples, etc.
@graph.rdfs:label: type
Instrument
@graph.rdfs:comment: This is the schema for describing the Instrument schema used for outbreak.info.
The name of the instrument
@graph.rdfs:label: name

@graph.rdfs:comment: The name of the manufacturer of the instrument
@graph.rdfs:label: manufacturer

@graph.rdfs:comment: The brand of the instrument
@graph.rdfs:label: brand

@graph.rdfs:comment: The model number of the instrument
@graph.rdfs:label: model
Organization
@graph.rdfs:comment: This is the schema for describing the Organization schema used for outbreak.info.
The name of the organization, team or group
@graph.rdfs:label: name

@graph.rdfs:comment: Alternative names or commonly used abbreviations for the organization, team or group
@graph.rdfs:label: alternateName

@graph.rdfs:comment: An overarching consortia, multi-institutional team or group in which the organization/team/group is a member or affiliate
@graph.rdfs:label: affiliation

@graph.rdfs:comment: The status of the organization's membership or affiliation in the overarching consortial, multi-institutional team or group (current, past)
@graph.rdfs:label: affiliationStatus

@graph.rdfs:comment: Members of this organization, team, or group
@graph.rdfs:label: members

@graph.rdfs:comment: Status of the members of this organization
@graph.rdfs:label: membershipStatus

@graph.rdfs:comment: A resource which a person played a role
@graph.rdfs:label: relatedTo

@graph.rdfs:comment: A classification of the organization by a resource. Eg- for ClinicalTrials funders, it's ["U.S. National Institutes of Health", "Other U.S. Federal agencies", "Industry", "All others"]
@graph.rdfs:label: class

@graph.rdfs:comment: The role of an organization in its involvement with a resource
@graph.rdfs:label: role
Person
@graph.rdfs:comment: This is the schema for describing the Person schema used for outbreak.info.
The name of the person
@graph.rdfs:label: name

@graph.rdfs:comment: Alternative ways in which the person's name is included in a record
@graph.rdfs:label: alternateName

@graph.rdfs:comment: The given name of the person
@graph.rdfs:label: givenName

@graph.rdfs:comment: The family name of the person
@graph.rdfs:label: familyName

@graph.rdfs:comment: The organization with which the person is affiliated or has membership in
@graph.rdfs:label: affiliation

@graph.rdfs:comment: The status of the person's membership or affiliation in an organization, team or group (current, past)
@graph.rdfs:label: affiliationStatus

@graph.rdfs:comment: The ORCID ID of the person
@graph.rdfs:label: orcid

@graph.rdfs:comment: A resource which a person played a role
@graph.rdfs:label: relatedTo

@graph.rdfs:comment: The role a person played in the creation of a resource
@graph.rdfs:label: role
DataDownload
@graph.rdfs:comment: This is the schema for describing the DataDownload schema used for outbreak.info.
Link to the location where the dataset can be found, ideally a permanent URL
@graph.rdfs:label: contentUrl

@graph.rdfs:comment: Date which the particular DataDownload (file) has been changed
@graph.rdfs:label: dateModified
MonetaryGrant
@graph.rdfs:comment: This is the schema for describing the MonetaryGrant schema used for outbreak.info.
The name of the monetary grant
@graph.rdfs:label: name

@graph.rdfs:comment: The grant ID or an identifier associated with the grant
@graph.rdfs:label: identifier

@graph.rdfs:comment: The url for the grant (if available)
@graph.rdfs:label: url

@graph.rdfs:comment: The funding organization of the grant
@graph.rdfs:label: funder

@graph.rdfs:comment: The name of the funding organization
@graph.rdfs:label: name

@graph.rdfs:comment: The person or organization to whom or to which the grant was awarded
@graph.rdfs:label: recipient

@graph.rdfs:comment: The name of the recipient of the grant
@graph.rdfs:label: name

@graph.rdfs:comment: The affiliation of the recipient of the grant
@graph.rdfs:label: affiliation
StudyEvent
@graph.rdfs:comment: This is the schema for describing the StudyEvent schema used for outbreak.info.
Type of the event status such as StudyStart, PrimaryCompletion, Completion, StudyFirstSubmit, StudyFirstSubmitQC, LastUpdateSubmit
@graph.rdfs:label: studyEventType

@graph.rdfs:comment: StartDate, Primary CompletionDate, CompletionDate, StudyFirstSubmitDate, StudyFirstSubmitQCDate, LastUpdateSubmitDate
@graph.rdfs:label: studyEventDate

@graph.rdfs:comment: the type of date provided (actual, anticipated, or estimated)
@graph.rdfs:label: studyEventDateType
StudyStatus
@graph.rdfs:comment: This is the schema for describing the StudyStatus schema used for outbreak.info.
The recruitment status of the study
@graph.rdfs:label: status

@graph.rdfs:comment: Flag for whether or not the study has expanded Access status
@graph.rdfs:label: statusExpandedAccess

@graph.rdfs:comment: The date that the status was verified. Equivalent to NCT's StatusVerifiedDate
@graph.rdfs:label: statusDate

@graph.rdfs:comment: The number of participants enrolled in the study
@graph.rdfs:label: enrollmentCount

@graph.rdfs:comment: The type of estimation used to determine the enrollmentCount (actual counts, target size, etc.)
@graph.rdfs:label: enrollmentType

@graph.rdfs:comment: A brief explanation of the reason(s) why such clinical study was stopped (for a clinical study that is "Suspended," "Terminated," or "Withdrawn" prior to its planned completion as anticipated by the protocol)
@graph.rdfs:label: whyStopped
StudyDesign
@graph.rdfs:comment: This is the schema for describing the StudyDesign schema used for outbreak.info.
Type of human study, can be subtypes of observational study or interventional studies and may include the temporal relationship of observation period to time of participant enrollment.
@graph.rdfs:label: studyType

@graph.rdfs:comment: Stage or phase of the study in the U.S.
@graph.rdfs:label: phase

@graph.rdfs:comment: The number of the phase or stage of the study
@graph.rdfs:label: phaseNumber

@graph.rdfs:comment: The method by which the study participants were allocated into groups
@graph.rdfs:label: designAllocation

@graph.rdfs:comment: The general design of the strategy for assigning interventions to participants in a clinical intervention study OR the general design of the strategy for identifying and following up with participants during an observational study.
@graph.rdfs:label: designModel

@graph.rdfs:comment: The primary purpose of the study
@graph.rdfs:label: designPrimaryPurpose

@graph.rdfs:comment: The people who not know which participants have been assigned to which interventions.
@graph.rdfs:label: designWhoMasked

@graph.rdfs:comment: String description of the study design if structured information not available
@graph.rdfs:label: designStudyText
StudyLocation
@graph.rdfs:comment: This is the schema for describing the StudyLocation schema used for outbreak.info.
The location of the study
@graph.rdfs:label: studyLocation

@graph.rdfs:comment: The city in which the facility used for the study is located
@graph.rdfs:label: studyLocationCity

@graph.rdfs:comment: The state or province in which the facility used for the study is located
@graph.rdfs:label: studyLocationState

@graph.rdfs:comment: The country in which the facility used for the study is located
@graph.rdfs:label: studyLocationCountry

@graph.rdfs:comment: The recruitment status of the study at the specific study site
@graph.rdfs:label: studyLocationStatus
Intervention
@graph.rdfs:comment: This is the schema for describing the Intervention schema used for outbreak.info.
The category of an intervention in the study
@graph.rdfs:label: category

@graph.rdfs:comment: The name of the intervention in the study
@graph.rdfs:label: name

@graph.rdfs:comment: A description of the intervention in the study
@graph.rdfs:label: description
ArmGroup
@graph.rdfs:comment: This is the schema for describing the ArmGroup schema used for outbreak.info.
The name of the arm or factor (can include a specific intervention, a placebo or even a lack of intervention, ie- 'no intervention' group)
@graph.rdfs:label: name

@graph.rdfs:comment: The role of the arm or factor in the study this is equivalent to the ArmType in ClinicalTrials.gov
@graph.rdfs:label: role

@graph.rdfs:comment: A description of the arm or factor
@graph.rdfs:label: description

@graph.rdfs:comment: The interventions (if any) in this ArmGroup
@graph.rdfs:label: intervention

@graph.rdfs:comment: The category of the arm or factor in the study
@graph.rdfs:label: category

@graph.rdfs:comment: The name of the intervention in the study
@graph.rdfs:label: name

@graph.rdfs:comment: A description of the intervention in the study
@graph.rdfs:label: description
Eligibility
@graph.rdfs:comment: This is the schema for describing the Eligibility schema used for outbreak.info.
criteria for inclusion in the study
@graph.rdfs:label: inclusionCriteria

@graph.rdfs:comment: the minimum age for a participant to be included in the study
@graph.rdfs:label: minimumAge

@graph.rdfs:comment: the maximum age for a participant to be included in the study
@graph.rdfs:label: maximumAge

@graph.rdfs:comment: the sex requirement to be included in the study
@graph.rdfs:label: gender

@graph.rdfs:comment: Boolean for whether or not participation is based on gender
@graph.rdfs:label: genderBased

@graph.rdfs:comment: Boolean to indicate whether or not healthy volunteers may be included in the study
@graph.rdfs:label: healthyVolunteers

@graph.rdfs:comment: the age category of a participant to be included in the study if a minimum and maximum age is not specified
@graph.rdfs:label: stdAge

@graph.rdfs:comment: criteria for exclusion from the study
@graph.rdfs:label: exclusionCriteria

@graph.rdfs:comment: The descriptive criteria as published for the Clinical Trial
@graph.rdfs:label: criteriaText
Outcome
@graph.rdfs:comment: This is the schema for describing the Outcome schema used for outbreak.info.
The outcome measure for the study
@graph.rdfs:label: outcomeMeasure

@graph.rdfs:comment: The specific time point(s) and overall duration of evaluation must be specified in this section.
@graph.rdfs:label: outcomeTimeFrame

@graph.rdfs:comment: The classification of the outcome measure as either primary, secondary, or exploratory
@graph.rdfs:label: outcomeType
Analysis
@graph.rdfs:comment: This is the schema for describing the Analysis schema used for outbreak.info.

identifier.description: An identifier associated with the analysis if available

doi.description: A DOI associated with the analysis if available

hasDownloadableContent.description: Indicates the site has content that can be downloaded (raw data, data sheets, charts, etc)

license.description: A license document that applies to this content, typically indicated by URL

domainUrl.description: The domain name or main site on which webpage or specific url can be found

datePublished.description: PublicationDate of the analysis online if available

dateModified.description: Most recent date for which the analysis model itself was updated

assumption.description: Statement of assumptions / limitations of the model

analysisTechnique.description: A technique or technology used in a analysis.

infectiousAgent.description: infectious agents(s) which are the focus of the analysis

infectiousDisease.description: The disease caused by the infectious agent. Important as some agents may cause multiple diseases

analysisTopic.description: The underlying question, goal, or aim of the analysis

author.description: The author of this content or rating.

contributor.description: A secondary contributor to the CreativeWork or Event.

maintainer.description: A maintainer of a Dataset, software package (SoftwareApplication), or other Project.

funding.description: A person or organization that supports (sponsors) something through some kind of financial contribution.

citedBy.description: A resource (publication, protocol, dataset, etc.) which was derived from this protocol

isBasedOn.description: A resource (publication, protocol, dataset, etc) from which this analysis was derived

relatedTo.description: Other resources related to, but not a derivative of nor derived from this analysis

curatedBy.description: The source from which this Analysis was identified for inclusion into Outbreak.info. Provides provenance for a resource which was curated by another.

curationDate.description: The date this resource was added into outbreak.info, or was updated in outbreak.info.

controlledVocabulary.definition: collection of vocabulary terms defined in ontologies

miscControlledVocabulary.description: collection of vocabulary terms defined in ontologies

moreControlledVocabulary.definition: collection of vocabulary terms defined in ontologies

citation.description: A citation object for a resource which is cited by the analysis (ie- is a derivative of the analysis) , related to the analysis, or from which the analysis was based on (ie- is derived from).

versionDate.description: Date of the version of the resource that is referenced

citeText.description: The bibliographic citation for the referenced resource as is provided

name.description: The name of the monetary grant that funded/funds the Analysis

identifier.description: Unique identifier(s) for the grant(s) used to fund the Analysis

@graph.rdfs:comment: The url of the item
@graph.rdfs:label: url

@graph.rdfs:comment: The domain name or main site on which webpage or specific url can be found
@graph.rdfs:label: domainUrl

@graph.rdfs:comment: An identifier associated with the analysis if available
@graph.rdfs:label: identifier

@graph.rdfs:comment: A DOI associated with the analysis if available
@graph.rdfs:label: doi

@graph.rdfs:comment: The name of the item.
@graph.rdfs:label: name

@graph.rdfs:comment: A description of the item.
@graph.rdfs:label: description

@graph.rdfs:comment: The author of this content or rating.
@graph.rdfs:label: author

@graph.rdfs:comment: The name of the author as provided by the resource
@graph.rdfs:label: name

@graph.rdfs:comment: The affiliation of the author
@graph.rdfs:label: affiliation

@graph.rdfs:comment: Funding for the generation of the analysis
@graph.rdfs:label: funding

@graph.rdfs:comment: The funder of the analysis
@graph.rdfs:label: funder

@graph.rdfs:comment: The identifier of the grant (if available)
@graph.rdfs:label: identifier

@graph.rdfs:comment: Indicates the site has content that can be downloaded (raw data, data sheets, charts, etc)
@graph.rdfs:label: hasDownloadableContent

@graph.rdfs:comment: The actual infectious agent, such as a specific bacterium
@graph.rdfs:label: infectiousAgent

@graph.rdfs:comment: The disease caused by the infectious agent. Important as some agents may cause multiple diseases
@graph.rdfs:label: infectiousDisease

@graph.rdfs:comment: A license document that applies to this content, typically indicated by URL
@graph.rdfs:label: license

@graph.rdfs:comment: PublicationDate of the analysis online if available
@graph.rdfs:label: datePublished

@graph.rdfs:comment: Most recent date for which the analysis model itself was updated
@graph.rdfs:label: dateModified

@graph.rdfs:comment: This is the analysis type, analytical technique or mathematical model used in this analysis
@graph.rdfs:label: analysisTechnique

@graph.rdfs:comment: The underlying question, goal, or aim of the analysis
@graph.rdfs:label: analysisTopic

@graph.rdfs:comment: Statement of assumptions / limitations of the model
@graph.rdfs:label: assumption

@graph.rdfs:comment: A resource (publication, protocol, dataset, etc.) which was derived from this protocol
@graph.rdfs:label: citedBy

@graph.rdfs:comment: name of the citedBy resource
@graph.rdfs:label: name

@graph.rdfs:comment: type (publication, protocol, dataset, code, etc.) of the citedBy resource
@graph.rdfs:label: type

@graph.rdfs:comment: identifier (pmid, WHO protocol id, etc.) of the citedby resource
@graph.rdfs:label: identifier

@graph.rdfs:comment: A resource (publication, protocol, dataset, etc) from which this analysis was derived
@graph.rdfs:label: isBasedOn

@graph.rdfs:comment: name of the isBasedOn resource
@graph.rdfs:label: name

@graph.rdfs:comment: type (publication, protocol, dataset, code, etc.) of the isBasedOn resource
@graph.rdfs:label: type

@graph.rdfs:comment: identifier (pmid, WHO protocol id, etc.) of the isBasedOn resource
@graph.rdfs:label: identifier

@graph.rdfs:comment: date of the version of the resource from which this analysis was derived. Note this is NOT the same as dateModified, as the protocol may be based on an earlier 'dateModified' than is what is available from the resource
@graph.rdfs:label: versionDate

@graph.rdfs:comment: Other resources related to, but not a derivative of nor derived from this analysis
@graph.rdfs:label: relatedTo

@graph.rdfs:comment: name of related resource
@graph.rdfs:label: name

@graph.rdfs:comment: type of related resource
@graph.rdfs:label: type

@graph.rdfs:comment: identifier (if available) of related resource
@graph.rdfs:label: identifier

@graph.rdfs:comment: A secondary contributor to the CreativeWork or Event.
@graph.rdfs:label: contributor

@graph.rdfs:comment: A maintainer of a Dataset, software package (SoftwareApplication), or other Project.
@graph.rdfs:label: maintainer

@graph.rdfs:comment: keywords
@graph.rdfs:label: keywords

@graph.rdfs:comment: Applicable outbreak.info category
@graph.rdfs:label: topicCategory

@graph.rdfs:comment: The source from which this Analysis was identified for inclusion into Outbreak.info. Provides provenance for a resource which was curated by another
@graph.rdfs:label: curatedBy

@graph.rdfs:comment: name of the source from which this Analysis was identified for inclusion
@graph.rdfs:label: name

@graph.rdfs:comment: The corresponding url for the item in the source from which this Analysis was identified (if available)
@graph.rdfs:label: url

@graph.rdfs:comment: The last date when items were pulled from the source
@graph.rdfs:label: versionDate

@graph.rdfs:comment: The date this resource was added to outbreak.info, or the date when this resource was updated in outbreak.info
@graph.rdfs:label: curationDate
Dataset
@graph.rdfs:comment: This is the schema for describing the Dataset schema used for outbreak.info.

description.description: Longer description of what is contained in the dataset

measurementTechnique.description: A technique or technology used in a Dataset, corresponding to the method used for measuring the corresponding variable(s).

variableMeasured.description: A technique or technology used in a Dataset, corresponding to the method used for measuring the corresponding variable(s).

doi.description: The DOI for the dataset if available

author.description: Name of the author or organization that created the dataset.  Note: schema.org/author and schema.org/organization have additional fields that can provide more information about the author/organization, if desired.

funding.description: Funding that supports (sponsors) the collection of this dataset through some kind of financial contribution

license.description: A license document that applies to this content, typically indicated by URL.

species.description: Species(es) from which dataset has been collected

infectiousAgent.description: infectious agents(s) which are the focus of the dataset

keywords.description: A list of keywords associated with this dataset

isBasedOn.description: A citation to a resource (eg- publication, protocol, etc.) on which this dataset was derived (stored as an object, not a string)

citedBy.description: A citation to a resource (eg- publication, protocol, etc.) which is derived from this dataset (stored as an object, not a string)

relatedTo.description: A citation to a resource (eg- publication, protocol, etc.) which is related to the dataset but is not a derivative nor was derived from the dataset (stored as an object, not a string)

curatedBy.description: The source from which this Dataset was identified for inclusion into Outbreak.info. Provides provenance for a resource which was curated by another.

curationDate.description: The date this resource was added into outbreak.info, or was updated in outbreak.info.

controlledVocabulary.description: collection of vocabulary terms defined in ontologies

miscControlledVocabulary.description: collection of vocabulary terms defined in ontologies

moreControlledVocabulary.definition: collection of vocabulary terms defined in ontologies

name.description: The name of the monetary grant that funded/funds the Dataset

identifier.description: Unique identifier(s) for the grant(s) used to fund the Dataset

citation.description: A citation object for a resource which is cited by the dataset (ie- is a derivative of the dataset) , related to the dataset, or from which the dataset was based on (ie- is derived from).

@graph.rdfs:comment: Short, descriptive title for the dataset
@graph.rdfs:label: name

@graph.rdfs:comment: Longer description of what was contained in the dataset. For example, dataset fields, ...
@graph.rdfs:label: description

@graph.rdfs:comment: Measurement technique(s) used in collecting the dataset, e.g. RNA sequencing
@graph.rdfs:label: measurementTechnique

@graph.rdfs:comment: The factors or variables measured in the dataset
@graph.rdfs:label: variableMeasured

@graph.rdfs:comment: person, people, or organization that created the dataset
@graph.rdfs:label: author

@graph.rdfs:comment: The name of the author as provided by the resource
@graph.rdfs:label: name

@graph.rdfs:comment: The author's affiliation(s)
@graph.rdfs:label: affiliation

@graph.rdfs:comment: Available downloads of the dataset
@graph.rdfs:label: dataDownload

@graph.rdfs:comment: Link to the location where the dataset can be found, ideally a permanent URL
@graph.rdfs:label: contentUrl

@graph.rdfs:comment: Date which the particular DataDownload (file) has been changed
@graph.rdfs:label: dateModified

@graph.rdfs:comment: Funding for the generation of the dataset
@graph.rdfs:label: funding

@graph.rdfs:comment: Name of the funding organization ofr the dataset. Note: schema.org/funder and schema.org/Grant have additional fields that can provide more information about the funding organization, if desired
@graph.rdfs:label: funder

@graph.rdfs:comment: The identifier of the grant (if available)
@graph.rdfs:label: identifier

@graph.rdfs:comment: Species(es) from which dataset has been collected
@graph.rdfs:label: species

@graph.rdfs:comment: The actual infectious agent, such as a specific bacterium
@graph.rdfs:label: infectiousAgent

@graph.rdfs:comment: Unique identifier for the dataset
@graph.rdfs:label: identifier

@graph.rdfs:comment: DOI for the dataset if available
@graph.rdfs:label: doi

@graph.rdfs:comment: License associated with re-use of the dataset
@graph.rdfs:label: license

@graph.rdfs:comment: Associated resource (protocols, publications, etc.) that utilized or was derived from this dataset.
@graph.rdfs:label: citedBy

@graph.rdfs:comment: name of the resource (publication, protocol, etc.) utilize or was derived from this dataset
@graph.rdfs:label: name

@graph.rdfs:comment: type of resource which utilized or was derived from this dataset
@graph.rdfs:label: type

@graph.rdfs:comment: identifier for this resource which utilized or was derived from this dataset
@graph.rdfs:label: identifier

@graph.rdfs:comment: Associated resource (guidelines, protocols, publications, etc.) from which this dataset was derived
@graph.rdfs:label: isBasedOn

@graph.rdfs:comment: name of the associated resource from which this dataset was derived
@graph.rdfs:label: name

@graph.rdfs:comment: Type of resource (publication, analysis, ClinicalTrial, dataset, etc.) from which this dataset was derived
@graph.rdfs:label: type

@graph.rdfs:comment: Identifier for the resource
@graph.rdfs:label: identifier

@graph.rdfs:comment: date of the version of the resource from which this dataset was derived. Note this is NOT the same as dateModified, as the dataset may be based on an earlier 'dateModified' than is what is available from the resource
@graph.rdfs:label: versionDate

@graph.rdfs:comment: Other resources related to, but not a derivative of nor derived from this dataset
@graph.rdfs:label: relatedTo

@graph.rdfs:comment: name of related resource
@graph.rdfs:label: name

@graph.rdfs:comment: type of related resource
@graph.rdfs:label: type

@graph.rdfs:comment: identifier (if available) of related resource
@graph.rdfs:label: identifier

@graph.rdfs:comment: Applicable outbreak.info category
@graph.rdfs:label: topicCategory

@graph.rdfs:comment: keywords
@graph.rdfs:label: keywords

@graph.rdfs:comment: The source from which this Analysis was identified for inclusion into Outbreak.info. Provides provenance for a resource which was curated by another
@graph.rdfs:label: curatedBy

@graph.rdfs:comment: name of the source from which this Analysis was identified for inclusion
@graph.rdfs:label: name

@graph.rdfs:comment: The corresponding url for the item in the source from which this Analysis was identified (if available)
@graph.rdfs:label: url

@graph.rdfs:comment: The last date when items were pulled from the source
@graph.rdfs:label: versionDate

@graph.rdfs:comment: The date this resource was added to outbreak.info, or the date when this resource was updated in outbreak.info
@graph.rdfs:label: curationDate
Protocol
@graph.rdfs:comment: This is the schema for describing the Protocol schema used for outbreak.info.

datePublished.description: PublicationDate of the protocol online if available

url.description: url where the protocol can be found

identifier.description: An identifier associated with the protocol (if available)

doi.description: A DOI associated with the protocol if available

warning.description: Precautions, warnings, and/or safety warnings associated with the protocol

correction.description: statement of what was updated/changed since prior version

material.description: the reagent, biological sample, or material such as PPE source materials) used or tested in this protocol

instrument.description: For LabProtocols it would be a laboratory equipment use by a person to follow one or more steps described in this LabProtocol.

measurementTechnique.description: A technique or technology used in this protocol.

usedToGenerate.description: Type of evidence/data generated by the protocol

inComplianceWith.description: Guidelines or Standards to which these protocols adhere. ie- GMP, GCP, other EQUATOR guidelines. Useful for selecting protocols where certain standards/guidelines must be met

author.description: person, people, or organization that created the protocol

citedBy.description: Associated guidelines, protocols, publications, etc. that include, adapt, modify, expand, etc. this protocol.

isBasedOn.description: Associated resource (guidelines, protocols, publications, etc.) from which this protocol was derived

relatedTo.description: Other resources related to, but not a derivative of nor derived from this protocol

curatedBy.description: The source from which this Protocol was identified for inclusion into Outbreak.info. Provides provenance for a resource which was curated by another.

curationDate.description: The date this resource was added into outbreak.info, or was updated in outbreak.info.

controlledVocabulary.definition: collection of vocabulary terms defined in ontologies

miscControlledVocabulary.definition: collection of vocabulary terms defined in ontologies

citation.description: A citation object for a resource which is cited by the dataset (ie- is a derivative of the dataset) , related to the dataset, or from which the dataset was based on (ie- is derived from).

versionDate.description: Date of the version of the resource that is referenced

citeText.description: The bibliographic citation for the referenced resource as is provided

name.description: The name of the monetary grant that funded/funds the Protocol

identifier.description: Unique identifier(s) for the grant(s) used to fund the Protocol

product.description: the reagent, biological sample, or material such as PPE source materials) used or tested in this protocol

name.description: The name of the material or reagent

manufacturer.description: The name of the manufacturer of the material, biosample, or reagent

brand.description: The name of the brand of the reagent, material, or biological sample (if different from the manufacturer)

identifier.description: The catalog number or identifier of the material or reagent

type.description: The type of material. Reagent, PPE, biological samples, etc.

instrument.description: A laboratory equipment use by a person to follow one or more steps described in this Protocol.

manufacturer.description: The name of the manufacturer of the material, biosample, or reagent

model.description: The model number of the instrument

@graph.rdfs:comment: url where the protocol can be found
@graph.rdfs:label: url

@graph.rdfs:comment: An identifier associated with the protocol (if available)
@graph.rdfs:label: identifier

@graph.rdfs:comment: A DOI associated with the protocol if available
@graph.rdfs:label: doi

@graph.rdfs:comment: name of the protocol
@graph.rdfs:label: name

@graph.rdfs:comment: description of the protocol
@graph.rdfs:label: description

@graph.rdfs:comment: The status of the protocol
@graph.rdfs:label: status

@graph.rdfs:comment: This is the measurement technique or assay type covered described by the protocol
@graph.rdfs:label: measurementTechnique

@graph.rdfs:comment: person, people, or organization that created the protocol
@graph.rdfs:label: author

@graph.rdfs:comment: The name of the author as provided by the resource
@graph.rdfs:label: name

@graph.rdfs:comment: The author's affiliation(s)
@graph.rdfs:label: affiliation

@graph.rdfs:comment: the reagent, biological sample, or material such as PPE source materials) used or tested in this protocol
@graph.rdfs:label: material

@graph.rdfs:comment: The name of the material or reagent
@graph.rdfs:label: name

@graph.rdfs:comment: The manufacturer, brand, or vendor of the material or reagent
@graph.rdfs:label: manufacturer

@graph.rdfs:comment: The catalog number or identifier of the material or reagent
@graph.rdfs:label: identifier

@graph.rdfs:comment: Type of material
@graph.rdfs:label: type

@graph.rdfs:comment: For LabProtocols it would be a laboratory equipment use by a person to follow one or more steps described in this LabProtocol.
@graph.rdfs:label: instrument

@graph.rdfs:comment: The name/model number of the instrument
@graph.rdfs:label: name

@graph.rdfs:comment: The manufacturer, brand, or vendor of the instrument
@graph.rdfs:label: manufacturer

@graph.rdfs:comment: Precautions, warnings, and/or safety warnings associated with the protocol
@graph.rdfs:label: warning

@graph.rdfs:comment: License
@graph.rdfs:label: license

@graph.rdfs:comment: Funding for the generation of the protocol
@graph.rdfs:label: funding

@graph.rdfs:comment: The funder of the study
@graph.rdfs:label: funder

@graph.rdfs:comment: The identifier of the grant (if available)
@graph.rdfs:label: identifier

@graph.rdfs:comment: PublicationDate of the protocol online if available
@graph.rdfs:label: datePublished

@graph.rdfs:comment: Date of protocol update
@graph.rdfs:label: dateModified

@graph.rdfs:comment: statement of what was updated/changed since prior version
@graph.rdfs:label: correction

@graph.rdfs:comment: Associated guidelines, protocols, publications, etc. that include, adapt, modify, expand, etc. this protocol.
@graph.rdfs:label: citedBy

@graph.rdfs:comment: name of the resource (publication, protocol, etc.) which was derived from this protocol
@graph.rdfs:label: name

@graph.rdfs:comment: type of resource which was derived from this protocol
@graph.rdfs:label: type

@graph.rdfs:comment: identifier for this resource which was derived from this protocol
@graph.rdfs:label: identifier

@graph.rdfs:comment: Associated resource (guidelines, protocols, publications, etc.) from which this protocol was derived
@graph.rdfs:label: isBasedOn

@graph.rdfs:comment: name of the associated resource from which this protocol was derived
@graph.rdfs:label: name

@graph.rdfs:comment: Type of resource (publication, analysis, ClinicalTrial, dataset, etc.) from which this protocol was derived
@graph.rdfs:label: type

@graph.rdfs:comment: Identifier for the resource
@graph.rdfs:label: identifier

@graph.rdfs:comment: date of the version of the resource from which this protocol was derived. Note this is NOT the same as dateModified, as the protocol may be based on an earlier 'dateModified' than is what is available from the resource
@graph.rdfs:label: versionDate

@graph.rdfs:comment: Other resources related to, but not a derivative of nor derived from this protocol
@graph.rdfs:label: relatedTo

@graph.rdfs:comment: name of related resource
@graph.rdfs:label: name

@graph.rdfs:comment: type of related resource
@graph.rdfs:label: type

@graph.rdfs:comment: identifier (if available_ of related resource
@graph.rdfs:label: identifier

@graph.rdfs:comment: Applicable outbreak.info category
@graph.rdfs:label: topicCategory

@graph.rdfs:comment: keywords
@graph.rdfs:label: keywords

@graph.rdfs:comment: Type of evidence/data generated by the protocol
@graph.rdfs:label: usedToGenerate

@graph.rdfs:comment: Guidelines or Standards to which these protocols adhere. ie- GMP, GCP, other EQUATOR guidelines. Useful for selecting protocols where certain standards/guidelines must be met
@graph.rdfs:label: inComplianceWith

@graph.rdfs:comment: The time it takes to actually carry out the protocol, in ISO 8601 date format.
@graph.rdfs:label: duration

@graph.rdfs:comment: The source from which this Analysis was identified for inclusion into Outbreak.info. Provides provenance for a resource which was curated by another
@graph.rdfs:label: curatedBy

@graph.rdfs:comment: name of the source from which this Analysis was identified for inclusion
@graph.rdfs:label: name

@graph.rdfs:comment: The corresponding url for the item in the source from which this Analysis was identified (if available)
@graph.rdfs:label: url

@graph.rdfs:comment: The last date when items were pulled from the source
@graph.rdfs:label: versionDate

@graph.rdfs:comment: The date this resource was added to outbreak.info, or the date when this resource was updated in outbreak.info
@graph.rdfs:label: curationDate
Publication
@graph.rdfs:comment: This is the schema for describing the Publication schema used for outbreak.info.

journalNameAbbrevation.description: Abbreviated Journal Title (note, this should be autopopulated)

volumeNumber.description: Volume number of journal in which the article was published

issueNumber.description: Issue of journal in which the article was published

pagination.description: Any description of pages for the article

url.description: url where the article can be found

publicationType.description: Type of publication such as preprint, research article, case report, etc

author.description: Name of the author or organization that created the dataset.  Note: schema.org/creator and schema.org/organization have additional fields that can provide more information about the author/organization, if desired

citedBy.description: other articles or resources that cite this publication

isBasedOn.description: Associated datasets, software, protocols, etc. used by the work described in this publication, including reference publications

relatedTo.description: Related articles or resources such as pre-prints, comments, editorial summaries of the article, etc. Helpful for de-duplication between pre-print and peer-reviewed version

curatedBy.description: The source from which this Publication was identified for inclusion into Outbreak.info. Provides provenance for a resource which was curated by another.

curationDate.description: The date this resource was added into outbreak.info, or was updated in outbreak.info.

citation.description: A citation object for a resource which is cited by the publication (ie- is a derivative of the publication) , related to the publication, or from which the publication was based on (ie- is derived from).

versionDate.description: Date of the version of the resource that is referenced

citeText.description: The bibliographic citation for the referenced resource as is provided

name.description: The name of the monetary grant that funded/funds the Dataset

identifier.description: Unique identifier(s) for the grant(s) used to fund the Dataset

@graph.rdfs:comment: Title of the article
@graph.rdfs:label: name

@graph.rdfs:label: type

ClinicalTrial
@graph.rdfs:comment: This is the schema for describing the ClinicalTrial schema used for outbreak.info.

name.description: Official or scientific title of the study

alternateName.description: Brief title, acronyms, or public titles for the study

identifier.description: Registration number or identifier assigned to the study

identifierSource.description: Source of identifier assignment or type of identifier (NCTid, China CTRid, EudraCT Number, etc.)

abstract.description: A brief summary of the study

description.description: A description of the study or the stated purpose of the study

healthCondition.description: The health condition or disease being studied

healthConditionIidentifier.description: Ontological or controlled vocabulary identifier for the health condition or disease

hasResults.description: Binary for if the clinical trial has published any results

url.description: url where the study can be found

author.description: The study's author, this includes ResponsiblePartyInvestigator, Contacts, and OverallOfficials

sponsor.description: A sponsor, funder, or collaborator for the study.

studyEvent.description: an event status such as StudyStart, PrimaryCompletion, Completion, StudyFirstSubmit, StudyFirstSubmitQC, LastUpdateSubmit

studyDesign.description: The general design of the study

armGroup.description: The arm or factor of an interventional study

outcome.description: The outcome (expected or actual) of a study

citedBy.description: other articles or resources that cite this clinical trial

isBasedOn.description: Associated datasets, software, protocols, etc. used by the work described in this clinical study (includes study protocol documents, data analysis plans, reference publications. etc)

relatedTo.description: Other resources related to, but not a derivative of nor derived from this analysis

curatedBy.description: The source from which this Clinical Study was identified for inclusion into Outbreak.info. Provides provenance for a resource which was curated by another.

curationDate.description: The date this resource was added into outbreak.info, or was updated in outbreak.info.

role.description: The role of this particular author in this study, this includes roles such as ResponsibleParty, Contacts, values of OverallOfficialRole, Investigator

studyevent.description: an event status such as StudyStart, PrimaryCompletion, Completion, StudyFirstSubmit, StudyFirstSubmitQC, LastUpdateSubmit

studyEventDate.description: StartDate, Primary CompletionDate, CompletionDate, StudyFirstSubmitDate, StudyFirstSubmitQCDate, LastUpdateSubmitDate

studyEventType.description: Type of the event status such as StudyStart, PrimaryCompletion, Completion, StudyFirstSubmit, StudyFirstSubmitQC, LastUpdateSubmit

studyEventDateType.description: the type of date provided (actual, anticipated, or estimated)

enrollmentCount.description: The number of participants enrolled in the study

whyStopped.description: A brief explanation of the reason(s) why such clinical study was stopped (for a clinical study that is "Suspended," "Terminated," or "Withdrawn" prior to its planned completion as anticipated by the protocol)

statusDate.description: The date that the status was verified. Equivalent to NCT's StatusVerifiedDate

status.description: The recruitment status of the study

statusExpandedAccess.description: Flag for whether or not the study has expanded Access status

enrollmentType.description: The type of estimation used to determine the enrollmentCount (actual counts, target size, etc.)

designStudyText.description: String description of the study design if structured information not available

studyType.description: Type of human study, can be subtypes of observational study or interventional studies and may include the temporal relationship of observation period to time of participant enrollment.

phase.description: Stage or phase of the study in the U.S.

phaseNumber.description: The number of the phase or stage of the study

designAllocation.description: The method by which the study participants were allocated into groups

designModel.description: The general design of the strategy for assigning interventions to participants in a clinical intervention study OR the general design of the strategy for identifying and following up with participants during an observational study.

designPrimaryPurpose.description: The primary purpose of the study

designWhoMasked.description: The people who not know which participants have been assigned to which interventions.

studylocation.description: The study sites or the location of the study

studyLocation.description: The location of the study as listed in the resouce.

studyLocationCity.description: The city in which the facility used for the study is located

studyLocationState.description: The state or province in which the facility used for the study is located

studyLocationCountry.description: The country in which the facility used for the study is located

studyLocationStatus.description: The recruitment status of the study at the specific study site

name.description: The name of the intervention in the study

description.description: A description of the intervention in the study

category.description: The category of an intervention in the study

name.description: The name of the arm or factor (can include a specific intervention, a placebo or even a lack of intervention, ie- 'no intervention' group)

description.description: A description of the arm or factor

role.description: The role of the arm or factor in the study this is equivalent to the ArmType in ClinicalTrials.gov

intervention.description: The interventions (if any) in this ArmGroup

outcomeTimeFrame.description: The specific time point(s) and overall duration of evaluation must be specified in this section.

outcomeMeasure.description: The outcome measure for the study

outcomeType.description: The classification of the outcome measure as either primary, secondary, or exploratory

minimumAge.description: the minimum age for a participant to be included in the study

maximumAge.description: the maximum age for a participant to be included in the study

criteriaText.description: The descriptive criteria as published for the Clinical Trial

inclusionCriteria.description: criteria for inclusion in the study

exclusionCriteria.description: criteria for exclusion from the study

gender.description: the sex requirement to be included in the study

genderBased.description: Boolean for whether or not participation is based on gender

healthyVolunteers.description: Boolean to indicate whether or not healthy volunteers may be included in the study

stdAge.description: the age category of a participant to be included in the study if a minimum and maximum age is not specified

citation.description: A citation object for a resource which is cited by the publication (ie- is a derivative of the publication) , related to the publication, or from which the publication was based on (ie- is derived from).

datePublished.description: The date for which this content of this citation was posted, published, or made available

versionDate.description: Date of the version of the resource that is referenced

citeText.description: The bibliographic citation for the referenced resource as is provided
